version_description: A new library of interesting patterns! Includes Gosper Glider Gun, R-pentomino, Acorn and Diehard, also the Glider and Lightweight spaceship and many more!
UI Fixes and improvements and better support for older iPod and iPad devices.

Adds a cycle detector that will display a message if a repeating pattern has been detected. Try running the blinker pattern to see it work!
Fixes an occasional crash when loading patterns.
Also fixes the version number appearing in the App Store.

Puts back the 64x64 and 128x128 and 256x256 board sizes.
Adds the Acorn and R-Pentomino patterns.

Single-step mode to watch the pattern evolve step-by-step
More UI improvements including a better layout for larger displays
This version adds the ability to step backward as well as forward.
